tool_description: Manages and segments contact lists for multi-channel survey distribution, organizing contacts by preferred communication channels and demographic criteria.

contact_data.description: Array of contact identifiers or contact group names

segmentation_criteria.description: Criteria for segmenting contacts (e.g., age_group, location, channel_preference)

error_messages: Invalid contact data: Ensure contact_data contains valid contact identifiers or group names.
Segmentation criteria not recognized: Use valid criteria like age_group, location, channel_preference, industry.
Channel preference invalid: Use supported channels like email, sms, web, mobile_push.
Contact list too large: Maximum 10,000 contacts allowed per operation.
usage: Provide contact_data as an array of contact IDs or group names. Optionally specify segmentation_criteria and channel_preferences to filter and organize contacts for targeted distribution.
